title: Equatore Pendant Lamp  Pearl Black/Small
body:
Equatore Pendant Lamp is Inspired by Gabriele & Oscar Buratti, a made in glass and metal and is part of a collection including table, floor and ceiling lamps. The light source like LEDs, sits in the panel which closes off the lampshade at the bottom. This luminous panel emits light both upwards into the lampshade as well as downwards onto the table.  Please note this is not an original item, many difference make this item an inspired by version.
_
